pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Radio Archives, Thousand Oaks Library Foundation
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains over 400 recordings of Slate's broadcasts, including his programs with co-hosts Leo Durocher and Jimmy Piersall as well as recordings of post-game interviews and press conferences with athletes and luncheons of the Southern California Sports Broadcasters Association. Also includes typescripts used in his broadcasts, photographs and publicity material related to his shows. As of 2005, the collection was partially processed.
